name: Treilla
overview:
Located in San Francisco and launched in 2012, Treilla helps lifestyle SMBs engage with and grow their consumer communities by transforming brand and domain-specific online conversations into actionable, real-time and location-based business intelligence through a simple, innovative mobile platform.

Small businesses face big challenges in effectively engaging with and growing their online consumer communities to produce higher profitability. Adding to the frustration, business models are shifting rapidly from web to social, local and mobile paradigms. New customer acquisition success highly depends on targeted real-time, local and mobile interaction. The complexity of the social media landscape and the rapid consumer adoption of sophisticated mobile devices has handicapped most small businesses trying to implement a cohesive strategy to improve their customer experience because of high costs.

Treilla’s proprietary cloud-based mobile platform offers a combination of elegant design and powerful social channel communication features customized by business domain needs. Features that are typically only available for enterprise clients include real-time conversation monitoring, tracking, response and analytics, domain and geo filtering, natural language processing, brand monitoring, sentiment and share of voice analytics.
